ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Kunark system specs
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/11/00 11:02:50 AM US Mountain Standard Time, ... Some yes. The zone information has to load and with lots of x,y,z positions to load as
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/11/00 11:02:50 AM US Mountain Standard Time,
nrusso@... writes:

> Could my connection be the
> culprit?


Some yes. The zone information has to load and with lots of x,y,z positions
to load as the servers move NPC and as players move around and have to be
relocated will cause some issues.

Ram and connection in my eyes are the 2 most important things. I am on a
modem but connect realistically between 45-50k avg. Sometimes I get some bad
areas of lag, like everyone, and FV suck big time! It is always always always
laggy and choppy, but move out of here and all is better.
